lead_paragraph: BARSOUM LOSADA--Elisa. Beloved wife, mother, daughter and friend passed on January 25. Wake at Fox Funeral Home, 9807 Ascan Ave., Forest Hills, NY 11375, on January 28 and 29 from 2pm to 9pm. In lieu of flowers, please donate to American Red Cross in Elisa's honor. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BARSOUM LOSADA, ELISA
